articles.author: Holly Ellyatt
articles.title: The world's 'football' is America's 'soccer': Trump signaled that could change - CNBC
articles.description: Trump appears to have caught the bug for what the British call "the Beautiful Game."
articles.content: U.S. President Donald Trump and FIFA President Gianni Infantino carry the FIFA Club World Cup trophy on stage before presenting it to Chelsea FC at MetLife Stadium on July 13, 2025 in East Rutherford… [+3568 chars]
